articles.title: Ivermectin for Prevention and Treatment of COVID-19
articles.description: Moderate-certainty evidence finds that large reductions in COVID-19 deaths are possible using ivermectin. The apparent safety and low cost suggest that ivermectin is likely to have a significant impact on the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic globally.
